REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0277 reute u f BC-FINAL-TERMS-SET-ON-EA 06-02 0074

TEXT.TITLE: FINAL TERMS SET ON EAGLE INDUSTRY WARRANT BOND
TEXT.BODY: The coupon on the 17 mln dlr, five year, equity warrant eurobond for Eagle Industry Co Ltd has been set at the indicated level of 1-7/8 pct, lead manager Nomura International Ltd said. The exercise price was set at 729 yen a share, representing a premium of 2.53 pct over today's closing price of 711 yen. The foreign exchange rate was set at 146.20 yen to the dollar. REUTER
